message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only willing to pay up to $10000 for the product. Would you be able to accommodate this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand your position, Alice. I am still committed to finding a fair price for the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500. This is my final offer.
